segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredible how the woman doesn't notice it at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so mischievous, taking cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed at their sneaky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really risking a fall with that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm the scene outside the window looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden is so well-maintained and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen when the woman finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me feel a bit tense.
segments.speaker: PAR
